pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a stunning timelapse video of the night sky as seen from the bow of a large ship at sea. The sky is a breathtaking canvas of countless stars. A vibrant green aurora, possibly the aurora borealis or australis, dances and shimmers along the horizon beneath a layer of clouds. The timelapse effect causes the stars, clouds, and the ethereal glow of the aurora to sweep across the frame at an accelerated speed.
